Description: Each time a module is solved, associate a voiceline with a number, then turn it into a hexadecimal digit. At the end, submit the resulting sequence of digits. Tags: email, voice, 17-buttons, play-button, words, sentences, 0-9, a-f, display, stages
Name: Sbemail Songs

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask about the number or font of the line displayed for each stage.
